info.name: Extended GPX Viewer
info.description:
Extended GPX viewer for ownCloud 7.0.x. Forked from Restless123 (Kai Graßnick) (https://github.com/Restless123/Owncloud-GPXviewer). Based on LeafletJS (http://leafletjs.com/) and GPX plugin by Maxime Petazzoni (https://github.com/mpetazzoni/leaflet-gpx).
This is using highcharts (http://www.highcharts.com/).
info.author: Frank Wiesemann
